description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with VANCOUVER PILE DRIVING. The average
  contract duration was 0.98 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.4M.
  The longest contract was 5.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $5.6M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.2M'

s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '6'
